post.author: Susefreak
post.body: Just wondering, would it be possible to do cross-compiles for the various platforms? (Mac, Linux and Win)

post.author: Deadite4
post.body: If you mean building the linux compile in a windows environment, then I haven't heard of it successfully being done. I have known it to be done using a type of virtual environment on a windows platform, but that still leaves you with needing to set up the virtual environment.
